timeline.bodyText:
This condition should be:
if (region == null || region.isEmpty())
timeline.author: anjalshireesh

replies.bodyText: Actually null region is allowed. When region is null we need to probe or use default region. However if region is provided, it should not be empty.
replies.author: balamurugana
